main.name: Oluwatosin Isijola
main.description: Specializing in scalable, high-performance Web and Mobile applications using React.js, a JavaScript library for front-end frame-work, Redux/React Context API for my state management and React-Native for Mobile-app development. Always available to learn for growth improvement and development
main.bio: My name is Oluwatosin, I'm a Software Developer. I also have over a decade experience in animation graphics. Currently I am open to working with a reputable company willing to put me to work.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything within software development.

resume.skillmessage: React.js, HTML5/JSX, CSS/SASS, JavaScript, Git, Node.js, Express.js, npm/npx, React Content API, Redux, Firebase, MongoDB, Material UI

work.title: Front-End Web Development
work.description: Manage IT related issues, from debugging to trouble shooting. Develop web application on demand by clients and serviced customers. Database Management. Still Graphics Designing. Web Content MAnagement.

testimonials.text: Tosin is a very dedicated and self initiative person. He is someone that gets on a job and make sure he sees the ends of it. He is a determined young man and always willing to learn. His ability to give feedback makes him exceptional to me. He is one person I will always recommend for a good service.

Tosin is a remarkable web developer I must say. Not only is he a great problem solver , he has the attributes of a perfectionist, he takes pride in his work, and is always ready to acquire new knowledge If given the  opportunity I have no doubt that he will be one of your finest web developers
